_header: No more ne will I wicked be
_description: A Resolve to Reform — three 6-line stanzas

BodDig2.First Lines:
No more [ne] willi wiked beForsake ich wille þis world is
                    fe…
BodDig2.Last Lines:
…for sothe i tel him mor þan wodeþat hantit
                    licherie
